term.title: Schulz–Zimm distribution

item.text: In an assembly of macromolecules, a continuous distribution with the differential mass-distribution function of the form: fw(x)dx = (a^(b + 1))/(Γ(b + 1)).x^b.e^(-a.x).dx is a parameter characterizing the chain length, such as relative molecular mass or degree of polymerization, a and b are positive adjustable parameters, and (Γ b + 1) is the gamma function of (b + 1).
